A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

DJF Torrent



"Spider-Man 3: The Definitive Cut" is an fanedit of Spider-Man 3 by DJ Firewolf based on "Spider-Man 3: Dark Cut" by Joelio. Made in response to the unfortunate misdirection of the film, this fanedit attempts to remove the extremely goofy and nonsensical moments of the film and convey a more serious tone throughout by eliminating select dialogue, altering scenes, and removing the cheesiness from Peter Parker while retaining the better comic relief and the darker parts of the story. It is presented in 1080p resolution with 5.1 channel surround audio, english subtitles, and chapters.
